item.title: 华尔街监管机构撤销加密货币资产会计指南
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会（SEC）周四废除了加密货币行业长期反对的会计指导意见，这是唐纳德-特朗普总统摆脱上届政府政策的早期举措，也是加密货币行业的一次胜利。【原文：The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rescinded on Thursday accounting guidance long opposed by the cryptocurrency industry, an early move in President Donald Trump's pivot away from the policies of the prior administration and a win for the crypto sector.】

item.title: 特朗普有望推高原油供应，石油价格下跌
item.description: 周五，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普向欧佩克及其实际领导者沙特阿拉伯施压，要求其降低价格以推动原油增产的广泛努力一天之后，石油市场下挫。【原文：Oil markets sank on Friday, a day after U.S. President Donald Trump pressured OPEC and its de facto leader Saudi Arabia to lower prices in a broad push to drive up crude production.】

item.title: 澳大利亚企业监管机构评估 ASX CHESS 故障后的监管应对方案
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所（ASX）的清算和结算软件 CHESS 上个月发生故障后，澳大利亚企业监管机构周五表示，正在评估监管对策的所有选项。【原文：Australia's corporate regulator said on Friday it was assessing all options for a regulatory response, after bourse operator ASX's clearing and settlement software CHESS broke down last month.】

item.title: 英国《金融时报》报道：星际之门人工智能项目将专门服务于 OpenAI
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周四报道，OpenAI、软银和甲骨文在美国开发人工智能数据中心的合资企业 Stargate 将专门为 ChatGPT 制造商 OpenAI 服务。【原文：Stargate, the joint venture by OpenAI, SoftBank and Oracle to develop data centers for artificial intelligence in the U.S., will exclusively serve ChatGPT maker OpenAI, the Financial Times reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 日元在日本央行决议前保持警惕；美元将出现周跌幅
item.description: 周五，在日本央行（BOJ）做出几乎肯定会加息的政策决定之前，日元成为货币市场的焦点，而美元则将迎来两个月来最糟糕的一周。【原文：The yen was front and centre for currency markets on Friday ahead of a Bank of Japan (BOJ) policy decision where it is all but certain to raise interest rates, while the dollar was headed for its worst week in two months.】

item.title: 特斯拉宣布在美国推出改良版 Model Y，售价 59,990 美元
item.description: 特斯拉周四在美国推出了改良版的 Model Y 汽车，起售价为 59,990 美元。【原文：Tesla launched a revamped version of its Model Y car in the United States on Thursday, with a starting price of $59,990.】

item.title: PMI 显示日本工厂活动降至 10 个月来最低水平
item.description: 周五进行的初步商业调查显示，尽管服务业在 1 月份进一步增强，但由于需求低迷，日本工厂活动下滑至 10 个月以来的最低水平。【原文：Japan's factory activity slumped to the lowest level in 10 months on sluggish demand though the service sector strengthened further in January, preliminary business surveys showed on Friday.】

item.title: Venture Global LNG 在美国 IPO 定价后融资 17.5 亿美元
item.description: 美国第二大液化天然气出口商 Venture Global LNG 周四表示，其美国首次公开募股定价后已募集 17.5 亿美元。【原文：Venture Global LNG has raised $1.75 billion after pricing its U.S. initial public offering, the second-largest exporter of liquefied natural gas in the United States said on Thursday.】

item.title: 罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司赢得价值 110 亿美元的英国核潜艇合同
item.description: 英国周五表示，已授予罗尔斯-罗伊斯公司一份价值 90 亿英镑（110 亿美元）的合同，为其潜艇舰队提供动力的核反应堆的设计、制造和支持服务。【原文：Britain said on Friday it had awarded Rolls-Royce a 9 billion pound ($11 billion) contract to design, make and provide support services to nuclear reactors that power its fleet of submarines.】

item.title: Meta 寻求紧急解决人工智能聊天机器人混淆美国总统姓名的问题
item.description: 一位熟悉该问题的人士说，Meta 的人工智能聊天机器人无法识别美国现任总统的问题本周被 Facebook 的所有者提升到紧急状态，需要快速解决。【原文：The inability of Meta's AI chatbot to identify the current president of the United States was elevated to urgent status by the Facebook owner this week, requiring a fast fix, a person familiar with the issue said.】

item.title: 日本核心通胀加速，12 月创 16 个月新高
item.description: 周五公布的数据显示，日本12月份核心消费者物价同比上涨3.0%，创下16个月来最快的年增长率，使市场对日本央行将继续提高超低利率的预期持续升温。【原文：Japan's core consumer prices rose 3.0% in December from a year earlier to mark the fastest annual pace in 16 months, data showed on Friday, keeping alive market expectations that the central bank will keep raising ultra-low interest rates.】

item.title: Blackstone 斥资 10 亿美元收购弗吉尼亚州数据中心附近的发电厂
item.description: 该资产管理公司周四告诉路透社，Blackstone 旗下专门从事能源行业投资的部门已同意收购 Potomac Energy Center，这笔交易象征着数据中心附近发电厂对投资者的诱惑力。【原文：The unit of Blackstone dedicated to investments in the energy industry has agreed to acquire Potomac Energy Center, the asset manager told Reuters on Thursday, in a deal symbolizing the allure to investors of power plants sited near data centers.】

item.title: 读卖新闻》称三菱汽车考虑不参与日产与本田的合并
item.description: 读卖新闻》（Yomiuri online）周五称，日产汽车的小伙伴三菱汽车公司（Mitsubishi Motors）正在考虑不加入日产汽车与本田汽车的业务合并计划。【原文：Mitsubishi Motors , a junior partner of Nissan Motor , is considering not joining a planned business merger between Nissan and Honda Motor , the Yomiuri online said on Friday.】

item.title: 好市多股东投票反对多元化计划报告提案
item.description: 美国好市多批发公司（Costco Wholesale）股东周四表示，在多元化和包容性政策受到严格审查的背景下，该公司股东投票反对一项提案，该提案要求公司就维持多元化和包容性举措的风险提交一份报告。【原文：Costco Wholesale shareholders voted against a proposal requesting a report on the risks of maintaining its diversity and inclusion initiatives, the U.S. company said on Thursday, against the backdrop of intense scrutiny of such policies.】

item.title: 特朗普下令制定人工智能行动计划，更多工作抹杀拜登的人工智能努力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的助手在白宫椭圆形办公室告诉记者，特朗普周四签署了一项与人工智能有关的行政命令，以 "让美国成为世界人工智能之都"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive order related to AI to "make America the world capital in artificial intelligence," his aide told reporters in the White House's Oval Office.】

item.title: 消息人士称道明银行全球反洗钱官员辞职
item.description: 两位消息人士周四告诉路透社，道明银行首席全球反洗钱官赫伯特-马扎里戈斯（Herbert Mazariegos）将立即辞职，因为该银行因合规失误被美国监管机构罚款，正在采取补救措施。【原文：TD Bank's Chief Global Anti-Money Laundering Officer Herbert Mazariegos is stepping down effective immediately, two sources told Reuters on Thursday, as the bank takes remediation actions after it was fined by U.S. regulators for compliance failures.】

item.title: 亿万富翁麦考特表示，他对联手竞购 TikTok 持开放态度
item.description: 美国商人弗兰克-麦考特（Frank McCourt）周四在达沃斯活动上对路透社表示，只要他能保持对TikTok美国业务的控制权，他愿意与其他买家联手收购TikTok。【原文：U.S. businessman Frank McCourt is open to teaming up with other buyers on a bid to take over the U.S. operations of TikTok as long as he can maintain control of the asset, he told Reuters at the Davos event on Thursday.】

item.title: 亚洲 日本央行决定--"鸽派加息 "即将到来？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: Rivian 首席执行官表示将于 2025 年推出免提驾驶系统
item.description: 电动汽车制造商 Rivian 首席执行官 RJ Scaringe 周四表示，公司计划于 2025 年推出先进的免提驾驶辅助系统，并于 2026 年推出 "熄火 "系统。【原文：Electric-vehicle maker Rivian plans to launch its advanced hands-free driver assistance systems in 2025 and its "eyes-off" systems in 2026, CEO RJ Scaringe said on Thursday.】

item.title: 波音公司预计因国防问题和罢工打击导致季度亏损超预期
item.description: 美国波音公司周四表示，由于国防部门的费用和一次严重罢工造成的损失，这家财务拮据的飞机制造商预计在下周公布第四季度业绩时，亏损额将超过预期。【原文：Boeing expects to report a larger-than-expected loss when it unveils fourth-quarter results next week, the financially strapped U.S. planemaker said on Thursday, due to charges at its defense unit and losses from a crippling strike.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙 2024 年薪酬上涨约 8
item.description: 摩根大通周四表示，首席执行官杰米-戴蒙 2024 年的薪酬攀升了约 8.3%，达到 3900 万美元。【原文：JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday CEO Jamie Dimon's 2024 compensation climbed about 8.3% to $39 million.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，电动汽车制造商尼古拉正在探索包括潜在出售在内的各种方案
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，电动汽车制造商尼古拉公司正在探索各种方案，包括出售部分业务或整个公司，因为它正在与资金短缺作斗争。【原文：EV maker Nikola is exploring options including selling parts of its business or the entire company as it struggles with a cash crunch, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 加密货币的魅力让达沃斯的一些投资者望而却步
item.description: 尽管眼看着比特币一路飙升，突破了 10 万美元，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）也宣誓就任美国 "加密货币总统"，但一些全球最大的投资者本周表示，他们仍计划保持观望。【原文：Despite watching Bitcoin's scorching run past $100,000 and the inauguration of Donald Trump, who has pledged to be a "crypto president" in the U.S., some of the world's largest investors said this week they still plan to stay on the sidelines.】

item.title: 联合健康任命内部人士接替遇害高管担任保险部门首席执行官
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）周四任命医疗保险业务主管蒂姆-诺埃尔（Tim Noel）担任其健康保险业务的最高职位，这是在该部门前首席执行官布莱恩-汤普森（Brian Thompson）遇害一个月后。【原文：UnitedHealth Group on Thursday named Tim Noel, the head of its Medicare business, to the top job at its health insurance business, a month after the unit's former CEO Brian Thompson was killed.】

item.title: 特朗普签署命令成立加密货币工作组
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四签署了一项命令，要求成立一个加密货币工作组。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Thursday signed an order to create a cryptocurrency working group.】

item.title: OpenAI 推出自动化网络任务工具，人工智能代理占据中心位置
item.description: 生成式人工智能领域的重量级公司 OpenAI 周四预览了一款可以在网络上为用户执行任务的人工智能代理，它正努力在日益激烈的竞争中增强其聊天机器人的功能。【原文：Generative artificial intelligence heavyweight OpenAI on Thursday previewed an AI agent that can carry out tasks on the web for users, as it seeks to enhance its chatbot amid intensifying competition.】

item.title: 爱立信首席技术官在达沃斯表示，爱立信已准备好利用特朗普的科技政策
item.description: 瑞典电信设备制造商爱立信公司首席技术官表示，预计在唐纳德-特朗普总统的领导下，美国将继续走在技术发展的前沿，该公司已准备好利用这一优势。【原文：Swedish telecom gear maker Ericsson expects the United States to continue to be at the forefront of technology development under President Donald Trump, which the company is ready to take advantage of, its chief technology officer said.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国将保证向欧洲供应液化天然气
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周四表示，美国将保证向欧洲供应液化天然气，尽管人们担心这一蓬勃发展的出口行业可能会提高美国消费者的天然气价格。【原文：President Donald Trump said on Thursday the United States would guarantee supplies of liquefied natural gas to Europe, even amid worries that the booming export industry could boost prices of gas for U.S. consumers.】

item.title: 美国最高法院允许反洗钱法生效
item.description: 美国最高法院周四为一项反洗钱联邦法律的实施扫清了障碍，该法律要求公司实体向美国财政部披露其真实受益所有人的身份。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court cleared the way on Thursday for the enforcement of an anti-money laundering federal law that requires corporate entities to disclose the identities of their real beneficial owners to the U.S. Treasury Department.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普呼吁钻探，但石油业不太可能贸然前往阿拉斯加
item.description: 公司官员和行业代表告诉路透社记者，在唐纳德-特朗普总统发布行政命令允许美国石油和天然气公司扩大在阿拉斯加和北极地区的开发后，这些公司不太可能这样做。【原文：U.S. oil and gas companies are unlikely to expand development in Alaska and the Arctic following President Donald Trump's executive order enabling them to do so, company officials and industry representatives told Reuters, noting a future president could easily reverse Trump's move.】
